traits.name: Afterstorm
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally evades a [Hit]: Deals a {3} {Wind} damage [Hit] to the attacker.'

traits.name: Concealed
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn, if this monster did not {attack} in this combat yet: Applies {Dodge} and {Shields} self for {0}.'

traits.name: Electrical Burn
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy reaches [5] {Burn} stacks: Deals a {Fire}/{Wind} [Hit] with {3} damage to that enemy and applies {Dodge} to self.'

traits.name: Evasion Mastery
traits.description: '{Crit Chance} on allies also increases their {Evasion} by {0%} of that amount.'

traits.name: Eye of the Storm
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Wind} or {Wild damage} dealt to enemies: Applies {Dodge} to each ally.'

traits.name: Haste
traits.description: '{Dodge} now only increases {Evasion} by {0%} per stack and doesn’t get consumed when attacked. After an ally’s turn, they consume {1} stacks of {Dodge} to {reactivate} their turn.'

traits.name: Martial Prowess
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally evades a [Hit]: Applies {Sidekick} to them. '

traits.name: Nimble Guardian
traits.description: 'Whenever Dodge is applied to this monster: Applies Dodge and Redirect to self.'

traits.name: Perseverance
traits.description: 'Whenever a debuff is applied to an ally: {2%} chance to apply {Dodge} to them.'

traits.name: Serpentine Maneuvers
traits.description: 'For every {0} [Hits] evaded by your allies: Applies {Power} to the ally with the lowest amount of {Power}.'

traits.name: Shadow Meld
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally [attacks] an enemy with {0} or more {Terror}: Applies {Dodge} to that ally.'

traits.name: Tailwind
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally evades a [Hit]: Generates {Wind} Aether; if you have {3} or more {Wind} Aether, {Wild} Aether is generated instead. '

traits.name: Endless Endurance
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} Age: Applies {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: Flawless Defense
traits.description: {Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self.\nFor every {1;0} {Shield} gained, gain {Power}.

traits.name: Incorruptible
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self. On every {1;0} {Retaliates}: Additionally cleanses {1;1} {Corruption} from self.'

traits.name: Mesmerize
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Applies {Redirect} to self.'

traits.name: Poison Glands
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {1} {Poison} to the enemy.'

traits.name: Protector
traits.description: As long as this monster has {Redirect}, allies gain +{0;0} {Defense} and +{1;0} {Shielding}.

traits.name: Purge Punishment
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: If this monster has {C0%} or more health, {purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Recovery
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: This monster heals itself equal to [1]/{0} of the damage it took last round.'

traits.name: Return To Aether
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Generates {Random Aether}.'

traits.name: Safeguard
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn, if this monster has less than {0} {Shield}: {Shields} self equal to the difference.'

traits.name: Shielded Torment
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: {Shields} self for {1} for every debuff stack on it.'

traits.name: Taunt
traits.description: 'At the start of combat: Applies {0;1} {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: True Grit
traits.description: 'Whenever {Redirect} is applied to this monster: {Shields} self for {1}.'

traits.name: Age of Fire
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Burn} stacks to all enemies equal to half of the amount of {Age} stacks on this monster.'

traits.name: Beacon
traits.description: 'Whenever one or more {Regeneration} stacks are consumed by an ally: Consumes a {Burn} stack on a random enemy to apply another {Regeneration} stack to the ally.'

traits.name: Burning Desire
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Burn} applied to enemies: {Shields} all allies for {1}.'

traits.name: Burning Fire
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Fire} [Aether] consumed by allies: Applies {Burn} to all enemies.'

traits.name: Burning Mark
traits.description: Allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance} against enemies for every stack of {Burn} on them.

traits.name: Controlled Burn
traits.description: 'For every Aether {purged} or {stolen} by allies: Applies {1} {Burn} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Burn}.'

traits.name: Cosmic Fire
traits.description: Every [3rd] {Fire} [Aether] generated by your allies is converted into {Wild} [Aether]. {Wild} [Aether] also counts as {Fire} [Aether] for the effects of your skills.

traits.name: Enkindled Aether
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Consumes up to one {Fire} [Aether] to deal a {0;3} {Fire} damage [Hit] and apply {1;1} {Burn} to {target enemy}.'

traits.name: Kindle
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Burn} applied to enemies: Generates {Fire} [Aether].'

traits.name: Overheat
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Triggers {Burn} on each enemy with {C0} or more {Burn} and applies {1;1} {Burn} to this monster for each one.'

traits.name: Overwhelming Heat
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Applies {1} Burn to target enemy for every {Power} stack on this monster.'

traits.name: Rapid Fire
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy gets {attacked} for the second time in the same turn: Triggers {Burn} on them.'

traits.name: Rising Fire
traits.description: 'Whenever {Burn} triggers on an enemy: Applies {Burn} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Burn}.'

types.name: TypeTank
types.description: This Type focuses on protecting other allies and retaliating against enemies.

types.name: TypeBurn
types.description: This Type focuses on Burn stacks, which deal increasing damage to enemies whenever they try to use Aether.
